mapper.select: select tti.q_idx, tpsr.prob_solve_idx, tpsr.diff_level, tpsr.correct, tpsr.prob_no, tpsr.prob_seq_no, tti.topic_nm, tti.categ_cd, tti.categ_nm, tti.chapter_nm, tti.section_nm, tti.subsection_nm, tpi.imgpath from ai_model_showcase.tb_member_info tmi join ai_model_showcase.tb_prob_solve_result tpsr on tmi.member_no = tpsr.member_no join ai_model_showcase.tb_prob_info tpi on tpsr.prob_no = tpi.prob_no join ai_model_showcase.tb_topic_info tti on tpsr.q_idx = tti.q_idx where tmi.member_no = #{memberNo} order by tpsr.prob_solve_idx asc limit 100;

select tpsr.prob_solve_idx, tti.subsection_nm, tti.topic_nm from ai_model_showcase.tb_member_info tmi left join ai_model_showcase.tb_prob_solve_result tpsr on tmi.member_no = tpsr.member_no left join ai_model_showcase.tb_topic_info tti on tpsr.q_idx = tti.q_idx where tpsr.prob_solve_idx = #{probSolveIdx};
select distinct tpsr.q_idx from ai_model_showcase.tb_prob_solve_result tpsr join ai_model_showcase.tb_topic_info tti on tpsr.q_idx = tti.q_idx where tti.categ_cd = #{categoryCode};
